main.name: Jalen Straka
main.description: I am a highly motivated Full-Stack developer with the desire to solve complicated problems and create exciting applications!
main.bio: I have a passion for learning new skills and tackling complex problems. I am new to programming however I strive to be the best that I can. I enjoy the full-stack spectrum and can comfortably work on all ends of a project. I'm a father of two beautiful children, Hailey and Malachi. I have been with my fiancee Amber for almost a decade and we have a Siberian Husky named Etho and a HuskyPoo named Miska.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: This is some, not all, of my competencies.

education.description: A 24 week intensive boot-camp from Trilogy at CWRU, taught by an extremely talented staff of senior developers

work.description: Because of the COVID-19 pandemic, I spent almost the entirety of my bootcamp working remote. We've completed three full scale projects in which I was lead developer and project manager on each of them.
